metadata.title: CVE-2022-45437 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-siteScripting') vulnerability in Artica PFMS Pandora FMS v765 on all allowsCross-Site Scripting (XSS). A user with edition privileges can create aPayload in the reporting dashboard module. An admin user can observe thePayload without interaction and attacker can get information.

criterions.comment: pandora package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
